## Dimensional Data Model

To design a dimensional data model, it's essential to first understand the concept of dimensions in data modeling. 

### Dimension

Dimension in data model is pretty similar to mathematical dimensions. A 2 dimensions data table storing product references and sales would be a plane. Adding another dimension, like market locations, moving from 2D to 3D data model would bring us a _cube_
